import React, { useState } from "react"; import OnboardingSideBar from "../components/OnboardingSideBar"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form"; const PersonalDetails = (props: any) =>{ const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false) const onSubmit =(data : any)=>{ setSubmitted(true); setTimeout( function() { setSubmitted(false ); props.history.push('/onboarding/personal-details') }, 2000 ); } return ( <>

PERSONAL DETAILS

{/*

We hate to ask, but regulations mandate us to.
Your BVN is safe with us!

*/} {submitted? <>

Sent successfully

Personal details created successfully

: <>
{/*

Please fill out this field.

*/}
{/*

Please fill out this field.

*/}
}
); }; export default PersonalDetails;
